body.p: This section contains topics that provide a basic overview of the DITA-OT CSS-based PDF Publishing Plugin, technical details, and some additional resources to help you with your customizations.
body.note: For more information and some tips in regard to publishing DITA documents to PDF using CSS, watch our Webinar: Transforming DITA documents to PDF using CSS, Part 1 â€“ Page Definitions, Cover Page and PDF Metadata.
